awd_titl_txt: Routing Control Strategies for Multicast Networks
awd_abstract_narration: This is a Research Planning Grant for women who have nt had prior  independent Federal research.  The award is allowing the PI to  develop a research program in the area of multicast communications  for highly parallel computing systems.  The planning activities are  concentrated on the investigation of routing contronl strategies  for multicast networks from the following aspects: 1) designing new  routing control strategies which can more effectively reduce the  non-uniformity of multicast connections; 2) developing a network  simulator to simulate the multicast networks under these routing  control strategies, and gather a large amount of statistical  performance data to compare different control strategies and guide  the theoretical analysis in the later phase of the research  systems.
